data.title: The Top 30 Global Medical Device Companies
data.meta_description: The Top 30 Global Medical Device Companies - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses the top 30 global medical device companies by sales in 2005. It notes that while US companies dominate the top 30, international companies are gaining more profits from global expansion, especially in China, Japan, and Europe. The success of companies varies, with most of the top 30 posting double-digit sales gains but some showing weaknesses. M&A activity is also common in the industry, with deals like Boston Scientific's acquisition of Guidant, which Johnson & Johnson had initially tried to acquire. The top company was Johnson & Johnson with $17.7 billion in medical device sales, driven by products like its drug-eluting stents.
